name: Firefighters Ulises & Armandillo
description:
My first game done under a week yay!

Don't let the fire spread or it's game over.

Controls

Aim with mouse

ActionButtonShoot waterLeft Mouse ClickRefill water containerA

Music & Soundeffects are CC0 Public Domain
